headerDisplay: For instructions on how to set up your BroadLink RM and Dyson BP01, [follow these instructions](https://github.com/jeremynoesen/homebridge-dyson-bp01#hardware-setup).

name.title: Name
name.description: Enter a name for the accessory. Changing this later will require you to set up the fan again using the instructions above.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: Enter the serial number of your Dyson BP01 to display it as part of the accessory information.

macAddress.title: MAC Address
macAddress.description: Enter the MAC address of the BroadLink RM you want to use. Leave this blank for automatic discovery.

exposeSensors.title: Expose Sensors
exposeSensors.description: Check this to expose sensors if you have the sensor cable for your BroadLink RM.
